name: daisyui
description: Styled and unstyled UI Components based on Tailwind CSS
author: Pouya Saadeghi

scripts.postcss: postcss base/index.css -o dist/base.css && postcss styled/index.css -o dist/styled.css
scripts.json: prejss-cli dist/base.css --format commonjs && prejss-cli dist/styled.css --format commonjs
scripts.build: npm run postcss && npm run json
scripts.add: touch base/$npm_config_name.css && touch styled/$npm_config_name.css && echo '@import "./'$npm_config_name'";' >> base/index.css && echo '@import "./'$npm_config_name'";' >> styled/index.css && open base/$npm_config_name.css && open styled/$npm_config_name.css
